description.narrative: This activity (Public Financial Management Trust Fund) is a component of Building Empowerment and Accountability in Malawi reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Multilateral organisation' and a budget of £7,239,819. This component benefits Malawi, and works in the following sector(s): Public finance management (PFM). , with the following implementing partners: Baker Tilly, Basel Institute on Governance, Coffey International Development, International Bank for Reconstruction and Development (IBRD), United States Agency for International Development (USAID), University of Edinburgh. The start date is 01-07-2011 and the end date is 31-10-2018.

participating-org.narrative: International Bank for Reconstruction and Development (IBRD)
United States Agency for International Development (USAID)
